00031 void TableMutatorIntervalHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00032   ScopedLock lock(mutex);
00033 
00034   if (active) {
00035     app_queue->add(new TableMutatorFlushHandler(this, event));
00036     self_register();
00037   }
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void TableMutatorIntervalHandler::self_register() {
00042   HT_ASSERT(comm->set_timer(mutator->flush_interval(), this) == Error::OK);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TableMutatorIntervalHandler::flush() {
00046   ScopedLock lock(mutex);
00047 
00048   if (active)
00049     mutator->interval_flush();
00050 }
